title: Report and Replace Lost Student ID Card
description: A student has lost their ID card and needs to deactivate it and get a replacement.

tasks.description: Identify the student and verify their identity.
Immediately deactivate the lost ID card in the campus security system to prevent misuse.
Inform the student about the process and fee for obtaining a replacement card at the campus card office.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for getting a new card.
